item.title: Asset Management: A Closer Look
item.author: Igor Fomenkov,
item.description: Above: Figure 1: How the buy-side and sell-side bridge the gap between corporates and investors With such a huge focus on the sell-side nowadays (both in terms of career opportunities as well as industry-related news), the other part of the global financial industry, the buy-side, is oftentimes â€¦
